sections.heading: Prerequisites
sections.text: to adoption of rule by local government.

sections.heading: Business
sections.text:
impact statement: Consideration at public meeting held before meeting to adopt

proposed rule required; required information; inclusion on agenda before

statement is available for public inspection prohibited.

sections.heading: Action
sections.text: in violation of certain provisions is void.

sections.heading: Nevada
sections.text:
Tax Commission authorized to adopt certain regulations and required to advise

local governments regarding procedures and forms required for compliance at

request of Committee on Local Government Finance.

sections.text:
of consular identification cards, permanent resident cards or tribal

sections.text:
